guide.label: How to play
guide.goal:
Each turn, you get a random dice to place in a column.
The goal is to score more points than your opponent when the game ends, which happens when one of the boards is full.
guide.rule1: You score even more points when stacking the same dice in a column.
guide.rule2: You remove all opponent's dice with the same value when placing a dice in the matching column.
